languages.text: "Ты выступил против меня — я хочу быть уверенн{mf|ым|ой}, что этого больше не повторится".
"You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."
languages.original_text: "Ты выступил против меня — я хочу быть уверенн{mf|ым|ой}, что этого больше не повторится".

traits.locale_text: "You stood against me, and I want to be certain that it will not happen again."
"You stood against me, and I want to be certain that it will not happen again."
"You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."
"You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."
"You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."
"You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."

languages.text: 「君は{mf|俺|私}に敵対した。そんなことが二度と起こらないよう、はっきりさせておきたい」
languages.original_text: "You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: 「君は{mf|俺|私}に敵対した。そんなことが二度と起こらないよう、はっきりさせておきたい」

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euch gegen mich gestellt. Ich will sichergehen, dass das nicht wieder geschieht."
languages.original_text: "You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euch gegen mich gestellt. Ich will sichergehen, dass das nicht wieder geschieht."

languages.text: « Vous vous êtes opposé à moi. Promettez-moi que cela ne se reproduira plus. »
languages.original_text: "You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous êtes opposé à moi. Promettez-moi que cela ne se reproduira plus. »

languages.text: «Se puso en mi contra. Quiero tener la certeza de que no volverá a ocurrir».
languages.original_text: "You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: «Se puso en mi contra. Quiero tener la certeza de que no volverá a ocurrir».

languages.text: “当时你也在反对我，我希望这种事情再也不要发生了。”
languages.original_text: "You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: “当时你也在反对我，我希望这种事情再也不要发生了。”

languages.text: "Bana karşı geldin. Bunun bir daha tekrarlanmayacağından emin olmak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "You stood against me. I want to be certain that will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: "Bana karşı geldin. Bunun bir daha tekrarlanmayacağından emin olmak istiyorum."
